TopicTitle: [0.24.2] TiberDyne Aerospace R&D Division - Shuttle System 3.6 Career Update!

Articles.Content: It would be cool if you could make the nose less pointy
Is this Project Dead?
No, just delayed, as Tiberion stated literally two posts above. *facedesk*

If you want, wrap the CFG's manually

Ok, taking down

EDIT: Done.

Sorry didn't notice someone had posted in here.

Still not dead, just a little hiatus. I need to dig through my development version to see where I left off, I think I was in the middle of an upscale of the parts. I need to do that and the config updates. But I don't plan on releasing anything before 0.21 because I want to see how the SAS updates affects the vectoring; might not need the compensator plugin so much anymore; we'll see.

Haven't talk to Pirate in a while, so the status of the explorer shuttle model is unknown.
We are getting a bit impatient, where's the (news) update?
You can ask devs ,but I think that it will be out before sunday.

Sorry been busy with testing, haven't worked on this yet. I'll probably start with making it compatible with 0.21 due to the SAS changes.

You'll have to be patient, sorry.

Did you attribute? You did everything but 1.

You should remove the link from your quote.

I was wondering if you were still planning on updating this for 0.20x as all the other shuttles out there are sometimes too large for what I want to accomplish. Any word now that the NovaPunch pack is done?

*edit: I did not see the posts prior to my own. My apologies.

Edited July 19, 2013 by hoodedarche0
The update for this has commenced; converting to the 0.20+ file format first, of course.
.20+ better mean .21 as well.

.20+ better mean .21 as well.

No disrespect intended but .20+ implies version .20 until the file structure is changed again, which did NOT happen in .21

No disrespect intended but .20+ implies version .20 until the file structure is changed again, which did NOT happen in .21

The save structure did change. You now need to hire Kerbals instead.

okay, so the savegame file structure changed, but did the structure of .craft files change in a way that breaks them? part.cfg file changes? If those two are unchanged or are changed in a way that does not break older stuff, then there shouldn't be any problems.
.20 changed fill structure. .21 changed sas

... people.

Yes, of course it will be compatible with 0.21. Lets not be obtuse.

okay, so the savegame file structure changed, but did the structure of .craft files change in a way that breaks them? part.cfg file changes? If those two are unchanged or are changed in a way that does not break older stuff, then there shouldn't be any problems.

Harv did say that the new Save structure (which is just moving day for CREW line group and VESSEL line group) breaks the save from 0.20.2 or earlier, but can be converted to the compatible version. Create a save file first, then follow the example to move everything in the old save. Or, just use the save converting system (Where is it anyway?).

0.21 changed both SAS and save structure, 0.20 changed the loading system (so that everything except mods dated 0.19.1 or earlier must runs on GameData folder).

And please, don't mind me for the talking.

Harv did say that the new Save structure (which is just moving day for CREW line group and VESSEL line group) breaks the save from 0.20.2 or earlier, but can be converted to the compatible version. Create a save file first, then follow the example to move everything in the old save. Or, just use the save converting system (Where is it anyway?).

0.21 changed both SAS and save structure, 0.20 changed the loading system (so that everything except mods dated 0.19.1 or earlier must runs on GameData folder).

And please, don't mind me for the talking.

With Respect to you, and appologies to tyberion this will be the last time I derail this, the save structure and the file structre are different. The mod file structure set up in .20 has had no changes in .21, as such adapting the file structure of an older mod to .20+ effectively makes it work in .21.
all i wanted to say was i hope it's .21 compatible! not start an argument.

did he just call me obtuse... lol, just kidding!!

great work by the way, relax and take your time, great mods take time, most of us understand that, and are not obtuse, at least I hope not, lol

Edited July 30, 2013 by Benzschwagel

Yes let's keep this track on thread and this thread on track shall we. Tiberion does great work and he(or she, i'm assuming he) has already stated that this Mod will eventually get converted over once Nova Punch is squared away and they are happy with it.
